description: A presentation featuring new researched findings about scandalous and worthy individuals who are memorialised in plaques and headstones at Holy Trinity Bow Church (The HAC Bow) carried out by Cian Hodge of Queen Mary University of London.

designers.architect: Daniel and James Austin local surveyors

factsheet.heading: Plaques and Gravestones Tour of Holy Trinity Church
paragraphs:
Join us on  SUNDAY 10 SEPTEMBER 12.30PM - 3PM Open of Frank Laws Monument exhibition. Holy Trinity Church hall and cemetery.
* TUESDAY 12 SEPTEMBER 4 - 5.45PM Another chance to view Frank's exhibition.
6 - 7.30pm - A Panel discussion exploring Cian Hodgeâ€™s new researched findings.  Sitting on the Panel are Edward Legon,  Nadia Valman,  Alastair Owens,  artist Frank Laws, Julian McIntosh Architects (JMA); (other speakers TBC)
7.30 - 8pm Refreshment

Train: OVERGROUND

name: Memorials and Communities Presentation at the HAC Bow
